entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
